intro: ^! Glad to see you. The next book in that N.K Jemisen series is ready for you. We just got new copies in."

s: ^Hey Rashad! That's great, I was waiting on it.
^Really? I've been stoked for it, thanks for letting me know it's in.

Chat1: ^Rashad?Smiling "I got us a grant to add more Black and Latine authors to our shelves, so if you have recommendations, I'm here for them."

s: ^I do have some recommendations. Congrats on the grant, that's really exciting.
^I can totally pass those on later. I have a quick question for you, though.

Chat2: ^Rashad?Smiling "It is isn't it? I've been trying to make sure we spend money on what the community wants, rather than random stuff the board wants to buy, like...diffusers."
^Rashad?Smiling "You know we don't need diuffusers in a library."

s: ^No one needs those in here. That reminds me, I could use your help.
^I love a diffuser, but maybe not here. Oh hey, I have a question for you.
^Mr Calindas is running the health booth, and he wants your opinion on something.
^We're having a health booth at the block party, and I could use your opinion on something.

Explain2: ^Rashad?Neutral "Oh? My Opinion? What do you need to know?"

s: ^What community health issues or programs would you want to know more about?
^What does the community need to know about health?

Suggestion1: ^Rashad?Smiling "Well, honestly Covid taught us that we need to teach people basic hygiene. At the library, we want people to wash their hands often."
^Rashad?Smiling "We also know that materials should be in many different languages, so that ESL speakers can access our materials."
^Rashad_Day 1_Materials need to be in many languages

Suggestion1.#: notification Rashad_Day 1_Materials need to be in many languages
notification Rashad_Day 1_Teaching basic hygiene is crucial

s: ^Those are great points. Can you think of anything else?
^That sounds pretty great. I'll take these suggestions back to the clinic.

Suggestion2: ^Rashad?Smiling "Hmm. Well, having access to free health classes or mental health classes is really useful. I never remember they have those."
^Rashad_Day 1_Free health and mental wellbeing classes are useful_Mrcalindas1

Suggestion2.#: notification Rashad_Day 1_Free health and mental wellbeing classes are useful_Mrcalindas1

s: ^Okay, that sounds good. Can you think of anything else?
^That sounds pretty great. I'll take this back to the clinic

Goodbye: ^Rashad?Smiling "Oh, well that's good. Thanks for asking my thoughts. Okay, I'm going to go to my next meeting I'll catch you around

s: ^I'll send you those book recommendations, okay? Take care!
